Module Slope.ECS

Package org.lucasstarsz.slope.component

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    IComponent
    This interface groups all components under one branch, allowing for generics to work as intended.
    IComponentArray
    An interface is needed so that the ECSComponentManager can tell a generic ECSComponentArray that an entity has been destroyed and it needs to update its array mappings.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ECSComponentArray<T extends IComponent>
    The container of components for each type of component to be stored.
    ECSComponentManager
    The manager of components and component types.
